00025 #include <QCalendarWidget>

00027 #include <QDateTime>

00030 #include "SunPosDialog.h"
00031 #include "MapDialog.h"

00035 SunPosDialog::SunPosDialog( QWidget* parent )
00036 : QDialog( parent )
00037 {
00038         setupUi(this);
00039         setFixedSize( QSize( 840, 460 ) );
00040         
00041         connect( calendarWidget, SIGNAL( selectionChanged( ) ), this, SLOT( CalculateSunPosition( ) ) );
00042         
00043         connect( uTimeSpin, SIGNAL( timeChanged ( QTime ) ), this, SLOT( CalculateSunPosition( ) ) );
00044         connect( cTimeSpin, SIGNAL( timeChanged ( QTime ) ), this, SLOT( CalculateSunPosition( ) ) );
00045         connect( zoneSpin, SIGNAL( valueChanged ( int) ), this, SLOT( CalculateSunPosition( ) ) );
00046         
00047         connect( longitudeSpin, SIGNAL( valueChanged (  double ) ), this, SLOT( CalculateSunPosition( ) ) );
00048         connect( longitudeSpin, SIGNAL( valueChanged (  double ) ), worldMap, SLOT( LocalLongitudeChanged( double ) ) );
00049         connect( latitudeSpin, SIGNAL( valueChanged ( double) ), this, SLOT( CalculateSunPosition( ) ) );
00050         
00051         connect( this, SIGNAL( changeRepresentation( cSunCoordinates ) ), worldMap, SLOT( SunChanged( cSunCoordinates ) ) );
00052         connect( this, SIGNAL( changeRepresentation( cSunCoordinates ) ), horizontalWidget, SLOT( CoordinatesChanged( cSunCoordinates ) ) );
00053         connect( this, SIGNAL( changeRepresentation( cSunCoordinates ) ), celestialWidget, SLOT( CoordinatesChanged( cSunCoordinates ) ) );
00054 }

00057 {
00058         
00059 }

00061 void SunPosDialog::ChangePosition( QDateTime time, double longitude, double latitude )
00062 {
00063         calendarWidget->setSelectedDate( time.date() );
00064         UT->setChecked( true);
00065         uTimeSpin->setTime( time.time() );
00066         
00067         longitudeSpin->setValue( longitude );
00068         latitudeSpin->setValue( latitude );
00069 }
00070 
00071 void SunPosDialog::on_updateButton_clicked()
00072 {       
00073         
00074         //CalculateSunPosition();
00075         QDateTime* time = GetTime();
00076         
00077         emit changeSunLight( time, longitudeSpin->value(), latitudeSpin->value() );
00078 
00079 }
00080 
00081 void SunPosDialog::CalculateSunPosition()
00082 {
00083 
00084    //Fecha y Hora
00085         QDateTime* time = GetTime();
00086 
00087         int year = time->date().year();
00088         int month = time->date().month();
00089         int day = time->date().day();
00090         
00091         double hours = time->time().hour ();
00092         double minutes = time->time().minute ();
00093         double seconds = time->time().second ();
00094         cTime myTime = { year, month, day, hours, minutes, seconds };
00095 
00096         //Localization
00097         double longitude = longitudeSpin->value();
00098         double latitude = latitudeSpin->value();
00099     cLocation myLocation = {longitude , latitude };
00100     
00101         //Calculate sun position
00102         cSunCoordinates results;
00103         sunpos( myTime, myLocation, &results );
00104     
00105     emit changeRepresentation(results); 
00106 }
00107 
00108 void SunPosDialog::on_selectButton_clicked()
00109 {
00110         MapDialog marbleDialog;
00111         marbleDialog.SetCoordinates( longitudeSpin->value()*( tgc::Pi / 180), -latitudeSpin->value()*( tgc::Pi / 180) );
00112         if( marbleDialog.exec() )
00113         {
00114                 double longitude;
00115                 double latitude;
00116                 marbleDialog.GetCoordinates( &longitude, &latitude );
00117         
00118         longitudeSpin->setValue( longitude * ( 180 / tgc::Pi ) );
00119         latitudeSpin->setValue( latitude * ( 180 / tgc::Pi ) );
00120     }
00121 }
00122 
00123 QDateTime* SunPosDialog::GetTime()
00124 {
00125         QDateTime* dateTime = new QDateTime;
00126         dateTime->setDate( calendarWidget->selectedDate() );
00127         
00128         QTime time;
00129         if(SunPosDialog::UT->isChecked())
00130                 dateTime->setTime( uTimeSpin->time() );
00131         else
00132         {
00133                 dateTime->setTime( cTimeSpin->time() );
00134                 dateTime->addSecs( zoneSpin->value() * 3600 );
00135         }
00136                         
00137 
00138         return dateTime;
00139 }
